analysis.summary: The field 'agreement_date' is clearly a date field that should capture when the agreement was made or signed by John Doe.
insights: Field name 'agreement_date' unambiguously indicates a date type field
This likely represents the execution or effective date of an agreement
Date fields are critical for legal documents and contract validity
Standard date format validation will be required
recommendations: Implement date picker UI component for consistent format entry
Use format MM/DD/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD depending on locale
Add validation to ensure date is not in the future (unless future-dated agreements are allowed)
Consider making this a required field with high priority
Add tooltip explaining whether this is the signature date or effective date
